update pay_statement_download_record set bill_type = #{billType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bill_date = #{billDate,jdbcType=DATE}, err_code = #{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, err_code_des = #{errCodeDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from pay_statement_download_record where bill_date = #{billDate,jdbcType=DATE} and status = 0 and bill_type NOT IN (SELECT bill_type FROM pay_statement_download_record where bill_date = #{billDate,jdbcType=DATE} and status = 1 GROUP BY bill_type) GROUP BY bill_type
